remarks: The image of a Cauchy filter by a continuous filter map is a Cauchy filter.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Nov-2017.)
statement:
fmcncfil.1 $e |- J = ( MetOpen ` D ) $.
fmcncfil.2 $e |- K = ( MetOpen ` E ) $.
fmcncfil $p |- ( ( ( D e. ( CMet ` X ) /\ E e. ( *Met ` Y ) /\ F e. ( J Cn K ) ) /\ B e. ( CauFil ` D ) ) -> ( ( Y FilMap F ) ` B ) e. ( CauFil ` E ) ) $.
